title: Best of The Beatles
text: I prefer The Beatles' older material; things went downhill after they replaced Pete Best.

title: JMitch
text: Taylor Swift owes much of her success to Joni Mitchell, who did it first and did it better.

title: The Final Word
text: People who rag on Pink Floyd's The Final Cut as a Roger Waters solo album are forgetting that Rogers Waters' solo albums kick ass.

title: Underrated gems
text: David Ackles and Laura Nyro are incredibly underrated artists.

title: Toolmaster!
text: Enough about The Replacements and Husker Du. The actual best Twin Cities rock band from the 80s was Trip Shakespeare.

title: There are limits, Bob
text: The best thing about Bob Dylan is that he does whatever the hell he wants, unless what he wants is to make three standards albums in a row. Come on, man.
